### Title
Evaluation of the Weapons Threat Reduction Program (WTRP)

### Reference Number
CBCB 45-87050269

### Solicitation Number
24-246305

### Publication Date
November 1, 2023

### Closing Date
November 13, 2023, 14:00:00 EST

### Synopsis

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade, and Development (DFATD) is seeking the services of an Evaluation Services Consultant and Subject Matter Expert to evaluate the performance and relevance of the Weapons Threat Reduction Program (WTRP). The WTRP is Canada's contributing initiative under the Global Partnership Against the Spread of Weapons and Materials of Mass Destruction.

### Objective
To evaluate the performance and relevance of the WTRP, meet the requirements of the Treasury Board Policy on Results, and identify areas for improvement.

### Evaluation Scope
The evaluation will encompass:

- Review of program documents and records
- Collection and analysis of data and metrics
- Conducting interviews with stakeholders
- Review of past evaluation reports and documents

### Evaluation Criteria
- The evaluation will focus on the WTRP's results and efficiency, expenditure management, and compliance with program guidelines and objectives
- Evaluation services will be guided by the Treasury Board Policy on Results and section 42.1 of the Financial Administration Act

### Conditions for Participation

* Canada Business No. (BCIN) registration
* Compliance with OECD Guidelines for Multinational Enterprises
* Ability to provide evidence of professional certification as a evaluator or equivalent qualification
* Examples of previous evaluations in the field of international cooperation and weapons threat reduction or equivalent experience

### Evaluation Method

* The evaluation methodology will be determined based on the selected proposal and in consultation with the evaluation team
* Respondents are expected to prepare and submit a detailed concept paper outlining the proposed approach and methods for conducting the evaluation

### Contact

* Martine Bray, Procurement Officer
* Email: [mbray@international.gc.ca](mailto:mbray@international.gc.ca), Phone: (343) 572-6812

### Document

* The complete solicitation document is available for download in English and French at: [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca)
